verses.verse: You are <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I <S%H7378>contend<s%> with <S%H1696>you;<s%> yet I would reason the <S%H4941>cause<s%> with <S%H1870>you:<s%> why does the way of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> why are all they at <S%H7951>ease<s%> who deal <S%H899>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously?<s%>

You have <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H8327>them,<s%> yes, they have taken root; they <S%H3212>grow,<s%> <S%H6213>yes,<s%> they bring forth <S%H6529>fruit:<s%> you are <S%H7138>near<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and far <S%H7350>from<s%> their <S%H3629>heart.<s%>

But <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7200>me;<s%> you see <S%H974>me,<s%> and try my <S%H3820>heart<s%> toward <S%H5423>you:<s%> pull them out like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter,<s%> and <S%H6942>prepare<s%> them for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter.<s%>

How long shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of the whole <S%H7704>country<s%> <S%H3001>wither?<s%> for the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H929>therein,<s%> the animals are <S%H5595>consumed,<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds;<s%> because they <S%H559>said,<s%> He shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> our latter <S%H319>end.<s%>

If you have <S%H7323>run<s%> with the <S%H7273>footmen,<s%> and they have <S%H3811>wearied<s%> <S%H8474>you,<s%> then how can you contend with <S%H5483>horses?<s%> and though in a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> you are <S%H982>secure,<s%> yet how will you <S%H6213>do<s%> in the pride of the <S%H3383>Jordan?<s%>

For even your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> even they have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H7121>you;<s%> even they have cried <S%H4392>aloud<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H539>you:<s%> don't believe <S%H1696>them,<s%> though they speak beautiful words to <S%H2896>you.<s%>

I have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> I have <S%H5203>cast<s%> off my <S%H5159>heritage;<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the dearly <S%H3033>beloved<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%> into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of her <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
My <S%H5159>heritage<s%> has become to me as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H3293>forest:<s%> she has <S%H5414>uttered<s%> her voice against <S%H8130>me;<s%> therefore I have hated her.

Is my <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to me as a <S%H6641>speckled<s%> <S%H5861>bird<s%> of <S%H5861>prey?<s%> are the birds of prey against her all <S%H5439>around?<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H622>assemble<s%> all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H857>bring<s%> them to <S%H402>devour.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> my <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> they have <S%H947>trodden<s%> my <S%H2513>portion<s%> under <S%H947>foot,<s%> they have <S%H5414>made<s%> my <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H2513>portion<s%> a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

They have <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H8076>desolation;<s%> it <S%H56>mourns<s%> to <S%H8077>me,<s%> being desolate; the whole <S%H776>land<s%> is made <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> because no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7760>lays<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H7703>Destroyers<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> on all the bare <S%H8205>heights<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> no <S%H1320>flesh<s%> has <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

They have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and have <S%H7114>reaped<s%> <S%H6975>thorns;<s%> they have put themselves to <S%H2470>pain,<s%> and <S%H3276>profit<s%> <S%H954>nothing:<s%> and you shall be ashamed of your <S%H8393>fruits,<s%> because of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> against all my <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> who <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> which I have caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit:<s%> <S%H5428>behold,<s%> I will pluck them up from off their <S%H127>land,<s%> and will pluck <S%H5428>up<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> from among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

It shall <S%H310>happen,<s%> after that I have plucked them <S%H5428>up,<s%> I will <S%H7725>return<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H7725>them;<s%> and I will bring them again, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H776>land.<s%>

It shall <S%H3925>happen,<s%> if they will diligently <S%H3925>learn<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives;<s%> even as they <S%H3925>taught<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal;<s%> then shall they be <S%H1129>built<s%> up in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
But if they will not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> then will I <S%H5428>pluck<s%> <S%H5428>up<s%> that <S%H1471>nation,<s%> plucking <S%H5428>up<s%> and destroying <S%H5002>it,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
